outline:
1. to look, regard
    1. (Piel) to look
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to look
      2. to regard, show regard to, pay attention to, consider
      3. to look upon, regard, show regard to
kjv_def: (cause to) behold, consider, look (down), regard, have respect, see.
strongs_def: to scan, i.e. look intently at; by implication, to regard with pleasure, favor or care
